name: jAstyle Java Artistic Style Library
short_description: jAstyle is a 100% pure Java port of the GPL’d AStyle (http://astyle.sourceforge.net/).  jAstyle is intented to be created as a library and not as a command line tool, so It does not support those options associated to standard output or console.
